title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system's default locale format) is being accepted instead of being rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, the system accepts it without any validation or rejection.
EB: The system should validate the date/time value before storing it in the report design and reject any invalid input.
SR:
1. Open the report design feature.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in the designated field.
3. Save the report design.
4. Verify that the system rejects the invalid date/time value and displays an appropriate error message.
